sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental)The character may spend one Destiny Point to add additional damage equal to his Agility rating to one hit of a successful attack made by ship or vehiclemounted weaponry.
